Description: Ensures that each customer_id in tsb.customer_data_bank is unique, as required by the PRIMARY KEY constraint.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks that there are no NULL values in the customer_id column, ensuring all records have a unique identifier.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_id IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where full_name is missing (NULL), which may impact customer identification.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE full_name IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where date_of_birth is missing (NULL), which may affect age calculations and KYC processes.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where gender is missing (NULL), which may impact demographic analysis.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where address is missing (NULL), which may impact communication or verification.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE address IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where phone_number is missing (NULL), which may affect customer contactability.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where email_address is missing (NULL), which may affect customer communication.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where national_id_or_passport_number is missing (NULL), which may impact identity verification.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where occupation is missing (NULL), which may affect profiling and risk assessment.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE occupation IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where customer_type is missing (NULL), which may impact segmentation and reporting.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_type IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where account_numbers is missing (NULL), which may affect account linkage.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where age is missing (NULL), which may impact demographic analysis.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where created_by is missing (NULL), which may impact audit trails.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_by IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where created_on is missing (NULL), which may impact audit trails and record tracking.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where modified_by is missing (NULL), which may impact audit trails for updates.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_by IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where modified_on is missing (NULL), which may impact audit trails for updates.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where status is missing (NULL), which may affect customer lifecycle tracking.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NULL

Description: Checks that the age column contains only non-negative values, ensuring logical consistency for age data.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NOT NULL AND age < 0

Description: Identifies records where email_address does not match a basic email pattern, which may indicate invalid emails.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL AND email_address !~* '^[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\.[A-Za-z]{2,}$'

Description: Checks for phone_number values that do not match a basic phone pattern (digits, optional +, -, spaces), which may indicate invalid phone numbers.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND phone_number !~* '^[+0-9 \-()]{7,}$'

Description: Checks that gender values are within expected domain (e.g., Male, Female, Other, Unspecified).
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NOT NULL AND gender NOT IN ('Male','Female','Other','Unspecified')

Description: Checks that status values are within expected domain (e.g., Active, Inactive, Suspended).
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NOT NULL AND status NOT IN ('Active','Inactive','Suspended')

Description: Identifies duplicate national_id_or_passport_number values, which should be unique for each customer for identity verification.
Custom_SQL: SELECT national_id_or_passport_number, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NOT NULL GROUP BY national_id_or_passport_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Identifies duplicate email_address values, which may indicate duplicate customer records.
Custom_SQL: SELECT email_address, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL GROUP BY email_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks for inconsistencies between age and date_of_birth (difference should match current date).
Custom_SQL: SELECT customer_id, age, date_of_birth FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NOT NULL AND date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND age <> EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AGE(current_date, date_of_birth))

Monitor Name: Validity: created_on is not in the future
Description: Checks that created_on timestamps are not set in the future, which may indicate data entry errors.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on > NOW()

Monitor Name: Validity: modified_on is not in the future
Description: Checks that modified_on timestamps are not set in the future, which may indicate data entry errors.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on > NOW()

Description: Checks that modified_on is not before created_on, ensuring logical update history.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on IS NOT NULL AND created_on IS NOT NULL AND modified_on < created_on

Description: Checks for gaps in the customer_id sequence, which may indicate missing records or deletions.
Custom_SQL: SELECT customer_id FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT generate_series((SELECT MIN(customer_id) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank),(SELECT MAX(customer_id) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank)))
